examples: People will also simply get bored.
I was bored.
I was bored.
- I'm bored.
I'm bored.
words.defineEn: tired and unhappy because there is nothing to do or because we are no longer interested in something
words.defineVi: mệt mỏi và không vui vì không có gì để làm hoặc vì chúng ta không còn hứng thú với điều gì đó

examples: The movie was as boring as they come.
It’s so boring, eating the same food day in, day out.
I have to do the same boring jobs day in day out.
The child nodded off to sleep during the boring lecture.
This course seemed right up my alley when I signed up for it, but it ended up being dreadfully boring.
words.defineEn: making us feel tired and unsatisfied because of not being interesting
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy mệt mỏi và không hài lòng vì không thú vị

examples: I'm feeling a little depressed at the moment, but I'm sure good times are just around the corner.
A person with schizophrenia isn't necessarily depressed.
I am depressed.
I was depressed.
I was depressed.
words.defineEn: feeling very unhappy and having no hope
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất buồn và không có hy vọng

examples: This is incredibly depressing.
But it becomes even more depressing.
It’s an incredibly depressing place.
Oh, that's a depressing distress call.
When I turned six years old, it was a very depressing time in my life.
I'm more relaxed now.
He must have been hoping for a relaxed time.
Rainy days make me feel calm and relaxed.
He managed to change the mood from tense to relaxed in minutes.
Your body is completely relaxed.
words.defineEn: feeling calm and at ease without tension or stress
words.defineVi: cảm thấy bình tĩnh và thoải mái mà không căng thẳng hay căng thẳng

examples: We should fill the bathtub with warm water for a relaxing bath.
My sister used to take a relaxing bath or shower before going to bed at night.
Costa Rica sounds like a great place for a relaxing vacation.
She sprinkled dried alkanet petals in her bathwater, turning it into a relaxing and visually appealing soak.
That was just so relaxing for me.
words.defineEn: helping our body or mind rest
words.defineVi: giúp cơ thể hoặc tâm trí của chúng tôi nghỉ ngơi

examples: John had always been interested in technology and gadgets.
Don’t rely on him for help, he’s only interested in saving his own skin.
Government is much more interested in announcements than it is in actually doing the work to set the economy back on its feet.
The Romans were not interested in persecuting people and putting them to the sword.
Our research showed us that women were more interested in their health than men.
words.defineEn: giving much attention to something or someone because one likes them
words.defineVi: chú ý nhiều đến một cái gì đó hoặc ai đó bởi vì một người thích họ

examples: You raise some interesting points.
We had a very interesting discussion about climate change.
It's an interesting proposal.
All of them had an interesting story to tell.
The game's premise and mechanics are interesting, but there's just no meat on the bone when it comes to story and gameplay variety.
words.defineEn: catching and keeping our attention because of being unusual, exciting, etc.
words.defineVi: thu hút và giữ sự chú ý của chúng tôi vì khác thường, thú vị, v.v.

examples: I'm excited about the next episode of my favorite TV show.
The children were excited to try the unusual-looking dragon fruit, an exotic accessory fruit.
The children were excited to learn about colors in art class.
We are excited to travel to our friend's wedding in another state.
She was excited to buy new clothes for the summer season.
words.defineEn: feeling very happy, interested, and energetic
words.defineVi: cảm thấy rất hạnh phúc, thích thú và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: Holy moly, this is exciting news!
The company CEO let the employees in on the exciting news about the upcoming merger.
Hockey is an exciting sport played on ice or field, with sticks and a small puck or ball.
Take the initiative and fill your life with exciting experiences.
They claim drag racing is the most exciting motor sport.
words.defineEn: making us feel interested, happy, and energetic
words.defineVi: khiến chúng ta cảm thấy thích thú, hạnh phúc và tràn đầy năng lượng

examples: As frightened as I am to die, I'm also curious to know what it's like beyond the veil.
The villagers are very frightened of his ghost.
Mr Edgar looked very frightened.
I was kind of frightened.
I was definitely frightened.
words.defineVi: cảm thấy sợ hãi hoặc lo lắng

examples: They are frightening the daylights out of people.
It’s a very frightening situation, but we mustn’t lose our heads.
It's frightening, how often her mind is blank.
They never watch scary movies because they find them too frightening.
The vibrations are frightening.
words.defineVi: khiến người ta cảm thấy sợ hãi
